added:
âš¡ï¸ Yooo. Thanks for adding me, I'm HeXaDex. My trainer merged me with a Telegram Bot, so I can give you a lot of informations about the Pokemon world! These are my commands: 
 
/start: Command list 
/data PokemonName: Get information about that PokÃ©mon 
/tms: Get tms list 
/types: get all pokemon types info 
/type 'typename': get specific type info 
/ptype 'PokemonName': get specific pokemon type info 
/faq: FAQ â“
/about: Informations about me ğŸ¤©
faq: â“ FAQ Q: What is HeXaDex? A: pokedex clone made by @bharath_boy, which is a bot which acts as a helper for trainers on Telegram. You can check information of Pokemon, without ever leaving the app Q: How to get Pokemon informations? A: Just write Pokemon name after /data command (eg: `/data Rotom`)
